name: @ArnabXD/TGVCBot
description: Telegram Bot to Play Music in Voice Chat

LOG_CHANNEL.description: LOG Channel ID (Make sure bot and VC User are added in the group)

SESSION.description: GramJS/Telethon Session of the VC User. https://ssg.rojser.best

CODEC.description: Custom Codec and extra FFPEMG args (default : `-c:a libmp3lame -b:a 128K`)

MAX_DURATION.description: Maximum Duration support for Streams (in seconds). Default 360
